name: Fire
content: That is what you do to me
Cut me up' set me free
That is what you do to me
现在，我正在烈火中行走
I'm walking in a fire with you
我和你一起在烈火中行走
I'm walking in a fire with you
我和你一起在烈火中行走
I would grow from the ground
I'm walking in a fire with you
我和你一起在烈火中行走
I'm walking in a fire with you
我和你一起在烈火中行走
You burn me up' you burn me up
你让我热血沸腾，我喜欢这种感觉
You burn me up' and I love it
你让我热血沸腾，我喜欢这种感觉
You burn me up' you burn me up
You burn me up' and I love it
你让我热血沸腾，我喜欢这种感觉
现在，我正在烈火中行走
I'm walking in a fire with you
我和你一起在烈火中行走
I'm walking in a fire with you
我和你一起在烈火中行走
Into you' you burn me up
走近你，你让我热血沸腾
You burn me up' you burn me up
